summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rixly landing page - all sections working correctly after production build. No 404 errors detected, preview URL is fully functional.
passed_tests: Hero section renders with 'Get Started' and 'Watch Demo' CTAs
Navigation links (Features, Testimonials, Pricing) scroll smoothly
Video section visible with professional content
Features bento grid displays 8 feature items
Testimonials section shows 12 real face images
Pricing section displays 3 tiers (Starter $49, Growth $149, Enterprise Custom)
